title: alpha client
body: why is alpha client is full of bugs and whats your problem with error 004 make your game work make your alpha client work

replies.body: This error is the client's way of letting you know that something might be blocking it from loading or updating properly.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  I'm not sure of any bugs, but let me know if I can assist you with something else.  Be sure to also submit reports for any bugs you find via the bug icon on the bottom right of the client.

This error usually occurs when your OS is blocking League from starting. 

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
